sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"sagan-ui"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#sagan-ui"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Sagan UI`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/npm/v/sagan-ui.svg","alt":"NPM"}}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://paesvitor.github.io/sagan"}}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/read-docs-blue.svg","alt":"Docs"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A UI component library for Farfetch for test purpose`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`npm install --save sagan-ui
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Wrap your application with ThemeProvider if you want a custom library configuration`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Create a themeConfig.js anywhere you want in your application and pass it as theme prop to ThemeProvider`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Check each Component Readme tab to see available props to your themeConfig`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`import React from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import { ThemeProvider, Button } from 'sagan-ui';
//import themeConfig from 'path-to-your-themeConfig-file';

// Theme configuration to change default values
const themeConfig = {
    // Override default buttonSize [12] and changes global buttonSize to 18
    buttonSize: 18
}

ReactDOM.render(
    <ThemeProvider theme={themeConfig}>
        <Button/>
    </ThemeProvider>,
    mountNode
);
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"developing"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#developing"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Developing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"1---install-all-dependencies"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h5" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#1---install-all-dependencies"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`1 - Install all dependencies`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`yarn
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"2---start-development-build"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h5" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#2---start-development-build"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`2 - Start development build`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`yarn start
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"3---test-your-changes-using-docz"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h5" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#3---test-your-changes-using-docz"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`3 - Test your changes using Docz`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`yarn docz:dev
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"31---create-a-mdx-doc-inside-your-component-and-import-your-component-inside-this-file"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h5" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#31---create-a-mdx-doc-inside-your-component-and-import-your-component-inside-this-file"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`3.1 - Create a .mdx doc inside your component and import your component inside this file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`---
name: Alert
---

import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Alert from './Alert'

<Playground>
  <Alert text="secondary"/>
</Playground>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h5" components={components} props={{"id":"4---test-your-changes-using-using-link-check-usage-guide-to-inject-custom-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h5" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#4---test-your-changes-using-using-link-check-usage-guide-to-inject-custom-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`4 - Test your changes using using link `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h5">{`(Check Usage guide to inject custom props)`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`// Use npm link inside sagan folder
npm link

// Then use npm link sagan-ui inside your project
npm link sagan-ui
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"documentation"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#documentation"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Documentation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Check out `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://paesvitor.github.io/sagan"}}>{`components documentation
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
